mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_contents(subcate_idx, type_idx, name, source, explanation, display, original, saved, keyword) VALUES(#{subcateIdx}, #{typeIdx}, #{name}, #{source}, #{explanation}, #{display}, #{original}, #{saved}, #{keyword})
mapper.select: SELECT tc.idx tc_idx, subcate_idx tc_subcate_idx, tc.type_idx tc_type_idx, tc.name tc_name, tc.source tc_source, tc.explanation tc_explanation, display tc_display, tc.original tc_original, tc.saved tc_saved, tc.upload_path tc_upload_path, tc.register_date tc_register_date, tc.update_date tc_update_date, tc.keyword tc_keyword, tct.idx tct_idx, tct.contents_idx tct_contents_idx, tct.original tct_original, tct.saved tct_saved, tct.upload_path tct_upload_path, tct.saved_path tct_saved_path, tct.orders tct_orders, tm.idx tm_maincate_idx FROM tb_contents tc INNER JOIN tb_contents_thumbnail tct ON tc.idx = tct.contents_idx INNER JOIN tb_subcategory ts ON tc.subcate_idx = ts.idx INNER JOIN tb_maincategory tm ON ts.maincate_idx = tm.idx WHERE tc.idx = #{contentsIdx}
